xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 10 Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika » 10.4 Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 10.4.2 Abyākatapada
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika
Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Hetu-ārammaṇa
35.
2083Cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
2084Cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2085Cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
36.
2086Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ…pe…  sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve…pe…  avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
